version_description:
Changes:
- Increased speed of translation, reduced number of errors!
- Fixed a major bug that was causing translation errors for many users!
- Added 31 new languages: Bengali, Burmese, Cebuano, Esperanto, Gujarati, Hausa, Hmong, Igbo, Javanese, Kannada, Kazakh, Khmer, Lao, Malagasy, Malayalam,Maori, Marathi, Mongolian, Nepali, Nyanja, Punjabi, Sinhala, Somali, Southern Sotho, Sundanese, Tajik, Tamil, Telugu, Uzbek, Yoruba, Zulu
- Localized Languages/Countries/Continents in all supported languages
- Added redundant server backend, improving translation speed and accuracy

If you like myLanguage Pro, would you mind taking a moment to write a nice review on the App Store? We'd greatly appreciate it. Just tap the heart button inside the app. Thanks for using myLanguage Pro!

If you're have any questions or concerns, please contact our support team at support@mylanguage.me
